entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as the name of the Lord Thing by Harry. The text states that this isn't a claim, it's fact, and Dumbledore told you last year.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone who told Vernon about Voldemort.

entities.name: kingsley shacklebolt
entities.description: Kingsley Shacklebolt is mentioned as one of the two fully grown wizards who visited Harry's house.

entities.name: arthur weasley
entities.description: Arthur Weasley is mentioned as one of the two fully grown wizards who visited Harry's house.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the person who has been through this about a hundred times already with his uncle Vernon.
